name: Rikky von Opel
introduction: Frederick "Rikky" von Opel (born 14 October 1947 in New York, New York State, United States) is an American-born Liechtensteiner former racing driver.  The only driver to compete in Formula One under the Liechtenstein flag, Von Opel spent two half-seasons in Formula One.  He was the son of Fritz von Opel, the grandson of Wilhelm von Opel, and great-grandson of Opel founder Adam Opel.
